channel.title: interest rates on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in interest rates on FinanClub

item.title: Banks Got Rising Rates Wrong
item.description: Banks Scramble to Adjust to Rising Interest Rates The Federal Reserve has been raising interest rates in an effort to combat inflation. The Fed has raised rates four times since March 2022, and is expected to continue raising rates in the coming months.

item.title: Latin America's Central Banks Should Start to Cut Rates
item.description: Latin America’s Central Banks Should Start to Cut Rates Latin America’s central banks have been raising interest rates in recent years in an effort to control inflation. However, inflation has now peaked in many countries in the region, and central banks should start to cut rates.
